J Riegger (US) 79 T Suzuki (Japan); A Oldcorn 80 D Fichardt (SA); T Jaidee (Tha) Today's weather forecast After yesterday's balmy conditions at Muirfield, spells of rain are forecast for this morning, slowly clearing from the west during the day. Maximum temperature: 18C (64F)
